vecUnachieved.strDescription: Have decayed food in your restaurant
Complete a flawless day without losing any customers.
Play blackjack or darts at the pub.
Open up your restaurant for 10 days!

data.strFullDescription:
[p]
[/p][p]
[/p][p]
[/p][p][img width="620" height="177"]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1001270/extras/05f18ce02729053fd2b9d605734d2d6a.avif?t=1754673197[/img][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1001270/extras/291542978b5173e808316447cdc9bf3f.poster.avif?t=1754673197" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1001270/extras/291542978b5173e808316447cdc9bf3f.webm?t=1754673197" width="606" height="238"][/imgvid]◆ You wouldn't say no for a little help with the workload. You can share your journey with your friends or other chefs from the community and get your business more productive than ever!
[/p][p][img width="620" height="177"]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1001270/extras/3994786c6c4354cc1839420fe6067830.avif?t=1754673197[/img][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1001270/extras/70c9fd5b0e19daa8c5cbe18f84ebee0e.poster.avif?t=1754673197" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1001270/extras/70c9fd5b0e19daa8c5cbe18f84ebee0e.webm?t=1754673197" width="606" height="238"][/imgvid]◆ Expand your recipe book and learn to cook various recipes from different cuisines around the world! Main courses, soups, appetizers, and desserts all waiting for your magic touch! Create a menu among these recipes, cook to perfection and raise your income as you do!
[/p][p][img width="620" height="177"]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1001270/extras/140bd7dc07c39b2ae37a9b81dcebdff5.avif?t=1754673197[/img][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1001270/extras/d57dcf38d0a787dbbdd8de64edfc7c3a.poster.avif?t=1754673197" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1001270/extras/d57dcf38d0a787dbbdd8de64edfc7c3a.webm?t=1754673197" width="606" height="238"][/imgvid]◆ Get your potential customer's eyes on your restaurant with designing the most attractive signboard ever!
[/p][p][img width="620" height="177"]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1001270/extras/a1be55f3a0848b2229ab5058307d6d0a.avif?t=1754673197[/img][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1001270/extras/992e3bcacda752a063cd3013387090c6.poster.avif?t=1754673197" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1001270/extras/992e3bcacda752a063cd3013387090c6.webm?t=1754673197" width="606" height="238"][/imgvid]◆ Get your restaurant to a unique atmosphere via various decoratives, wallpapers, kitchen furnitures, tables and more. Create additional incomes with placeable stations.
[/p][p][img width="620" height="177"]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1001270/extras/d0242c23e0e5e1438b778ce431f89d4c.avif?t=1754673197[/img][imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1001270/extras/6f951bdc03d3fcc12599b88a0949c32c.poster.avif?t=1754673197" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1001270/extras/6f951bdc03d3fcc12599b88a0949c32c.webm?t=1754673197" width="606" height="238"][/imgvid]◆ It's been a hard day under the heat of your grill. Now it's time to chill yourself at pub with some ice cold drinks! Hang out with your friends, listen to music and play some games![/p]
data.strSnippet: Kebab Chefs! is a Co-Op, cooking and restaurant management game that can be played up to 4 players. Design your own restaurant. Cook delicious foods, fill your menu with various recipes, feed customers and become the biggest kebab restaurant in town!
